entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:43 a.m. EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
